text:
Hello, I'm a HubSpot newbie, I have a question, I'm creating a module that have a *HubDB Table* field, I want to specify a default value, but my issue is why do I have to specify a *HubDB table id* instead of a *Table name*? I have a Production and Sandbox environment, the *Table Id* between these environments are different.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#hubdb-table>
I seem to be missing something, what's the point of setting a default selection if its not actually selected and exposed when doing fields.json?

probably something to do with HubSpot Video. They removed Vidyard in favour on their own video hosting platform

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Marketing-Integrations/HubSpot-Video-and-Vidyard-Update/m-p/513347>
